Comment: Sure sure.. but that immoral person would have been a few generations back in his family.  Dude has spent a shit-ton of money helping people.  Most of the money he's made on his own has been through VC funding for startups, so pretty low on the "immoral" side of things.  The saying is "nobody ever *makes* a billion dollars" - and he didn't, he inherited it.  He then went and advocated for a estate tax, and pushed here in Illinois for a progressive tax that would see *his taxes* increased (spending millions of his own money on ads for it)  Believe what you want, but judge the guy based on the quality of his character and his actions - by every single measure, he appears to be a good guy.
